website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and easy to use, this board also performs well and comes with a tether so you will not lose it.
pros: Comes in green, blue or pink
Includes a set of fin tethers
A bigger board that kids can still handle
cons: The skin has a tendency to come away from the foam on this board, but it does not seem to affect the performance of the product

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Paid a lot of for this one because of the size and because it was not one of the cheap cloth ones. Got it in the mail and the entire bottom was I bubbled up and the glue was peeling off. I'm sure once it's used more than a couple of times it'll fall apart from the water that gets inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 4 days at the beach used by children.
customer_reviews.text: I think the pictures speak for themselves. These boards were used by an 11 year old and an 8 year old. Just normal wave riding at the beach and didn't last 4 days. Surf and Snow Warehouse deserves 5 stars for the outstanding customer service. I would purchase from the again.
customer_reviews.author: Starfish48

customer_reviews.title: Blair runs a great company. He actually cares about his customers' satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Blair runs a great company. He actually cares about his customers' satisfaction! He sends relevant personal messages and responses, which are so cool! The product is exactly what you would expect for the money: it will last about one season, depending on how often the board is used and what kind of bottom you surf over! All considered, best customer service from any Amazon retailer in over 10 years!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Malkoff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boards and customer service! Buy one!
customer_reviews.text: My family really enjoyed catching waves on the two boards that we purchased. Unfortunately one of the boards cracked when my son was coming in on a wave. The company stood by their word and I received a quick and full refund on the board. I was very happy and impressed, the other board has held up great and even went through a second vacation this summer with a friend and her kids. I will definitely buy another board.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! The product, and customer service
customer_reviews.text: More than totally satisfied with the quality of the board, the attachments, and the customer service. The board is seriously amazing - light, incredibly sturdy, and very aesthetic. Love it!! Love the kind and helpful customer service. I had no issues with the board, but I really appreciated the instructions email, and note from the owner with the direct email link. 11/10 would recommend and use for future shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Best Boogie Board-Highly Recommended~
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he loves it. I ordered based on your weight/height chart-perfect size for him. He loves the slick white bottom and said it's the first time he's been able to ride a wave so fast and completely to shore. Very light and very high quality board. We use in rough surf off south FL beaches and have been very pleased. Glad I read the reviews and spent a little more for this board-so worth it! Thanks you~
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great moderately priced bodyboard
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these two years ago to replace my Slick Lizard that was bubbling like crazy. I liked it so much I bought another one in preparation for this years' beach vacation. They are well made, the strong and adult sized leash are great for all sizes of riders to use easily. We have a 8 yr olds, 14-16 yr olds and some late 40 year olds who want to ride waves and these boards work for all of them. Great board for the price. YWish they offered a red or orange color though.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good product, just used in Cocoa Beach for spring ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, just used in Cocoa Beach for spring break. My daughters and I really like the three we bought, much better than the cheap Ron Jon boards we bought last year.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Franklin

customer_reviews.title: This was a great body board until it started to bubble.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great body board for my 5 year old Granddaughter. She learned on a full size board but complained about arm rash so i looked around and bought this board and she is glad i did, she is in the water all day! perfect size for your little one.Update!! we've had this board for 34 days and the deck is starting to BUBBLE!! in a few spots! and i can't return it because it's past the 30 day period, BE WARNED!!! buy at your own risk......
customer_reviews.author: rlf

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for my kids!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these in 2017 for our yearly week long beach trip. So far they have held up and we always make sure there is room in the car to pack them. My sister bought a cheaper board and after using these she realized that there was such a huge quality difference so she plans to buy her own for our next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one of these for each of my 2 daughters (ages 9 and 12) based on all the positive reviews. Took them to the beach on a day with moderate sized waves. Boards were comfortable and performed very well but after a only few hours of fairly light use on the very first day both boards had edges that were peeling away from the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Peter Giuliano

customer_reviews.title: Literally comes apart at the seams
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our six-year-old to play with in Lake Erie. Unfortunately, the covering is ripping off after just a few uses. It seems like whatever they used to glue the seam together doesn’t work very well. I’m going to have to try to superglue it now or something.
customer_reviews.author: jcl5150

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun BUT it bent after the first couple of uses
customer_reviews.text: Finally upgraded to a hard/slick bottom boogie board. Lots of fun BUT it bent after the first couple of uses. It's still fine to use I just would have liked to see it be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: jessica m

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 1 summer
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these boards. My daughters loved them while they were usable. However, after only 1 summer of use, the bottom is completely peeling off of the foam on BOTH of the boards. They are definitely not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: NJ_Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Fun to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these boards for my grandkids and their grandparents. These boards are well made and well balanced. The leashes are very comfortable to use. They work well for the grandchildren (4, 6, and 8) as well as the adults.
customer_reviews.author: saythornton

customer_reviews.title: A Holiday Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Our pink loving beach babe loved her new boogie board, I loved that it is offered in different sizes so we could actually get one that will fit her now that she is growing. Seems to be made of a quality foam top and bottom, unlike most of the ones you end up with if you wait to buy some 15 dollar one on the boardwalk. She is already excited for winter to be over so we can go to the beach and she can ride the waves.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered from Amazon after reading the reviews of the 'Beach Attack Pack' and very happy I went with this board. I like to support small family business's who work hard to deliver great products and this one meet all my expectations. Delivery was prompt and boqrd was nicely packaged with all the accessories in the picture. Thank you Surf & Snow warehouse. Keep up the great work!
customer_reviews.author: Naveed Anwar

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy and light weight body board that comes with a leash and fin tethers. It is exactly as seen in the picture. My daughter is very pleased with it and looks forward to using it at the beach for the rest of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: anature

customer_reviews.title: low quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: For $50, this board is not worth it. Better off going to some beach shop and buying one there. It will be the same quality. We used it for 2 days then the blue foam started peeling off in different spots. I expected a better product for how muhc I paid for it but I guess you live and you learn.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Good until it wasn't - but seller refunded my money after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: It bubbled pretty quickly despite following the instructions about not leaving it face up. That was OK, but the it catastrophically delaminated at 2 months old. We go to the beach a bit but this was not nearly as durable as the Younger brand board we bought several years ago. That one is in better shape. UPDATE: I EMAILED SELLER, GOT AN IMMEDIATE RESPONSE ASKING FOR PICTURES. AFTER SENDING PICTURES, THEY REFUNDED ME 100%. THIS WAS 3 MONTHS AFTER PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Did not last one season!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to give these boogie boards to my beach loving grandkids. I purchased two at the same time, different colors. We love the beach and do spend many days during the summer enjoying the ocean. We take good care of them. The kids do not drag them in the sand and try to keep them covered by towels when not in the water. These boards made it about half way through the summer. The colored parts peeled completely off on both boards. VERY disappointed Do not purchase this board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We had bought her a cheap version to make sure she liked the activity and when she did decided to upgrade ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 10 year old daughter who is new to bodyboarding. We had bought her a cheap version to make sure she liked the activity and when she did decided to upgrade to this board. I'm glad we did. The size is perfect for her with a little room to grow and glides along the water beautifully with the slick plastic bottom. The wrist attachment is nice and made of good quality materials. I would recommend this board to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these and the entire family loved them. They held up well to abuse at both the ocean and in the pool with no issues. It seems like all boogie boards are hit and miss and so far I am very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Delaminated after just 6 uses
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor construction quality. The board came apart after just 6 uses by a 7-year old (we got him a bigger board than he needed figuring it would last years and he'd grow into it).
customer_reviews.author: Solandri

customer_reviews.title: Got folded by a wave
customer_reviews.text: The board worked well for 3 days and then got folded in half by a wave. It may have been an unfortunate occurrence with just bad luck. But I've had a Morey board for 16 years with no issues. This was toast in 3 days of being used by my 13yo.
customer_reviews.author: SBellmore

customer_reviews.title: Great, solid
customer_reviews.text: Great, solid, well made. Kids had lots of fun and it held up to the waves and sand without looking beaten up.
customer_reviews.author: SkiMamaOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: Brightest and most terrific board on the beach
customer_reviews.text: I love the vibrant pink color of our board and that the leash is the perfect length! My little 7 year old and I went out to body board. I have not body boarded for years and the board was perfect for me. I also liked that the site told me what size to get as I was clueless.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Boards just crumble in less than a month. Bought two boards for myself and son, they ripped and tear from every direction. Glued back only to open from other side in NY beaches... not real waves..
customer_reviews.author: Tal Peleg

customer_reviews.title: Love these boards
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boards! Got them for my kids, ended up using them just as much! Really durable. Must be mindful to not leave the top in the sun for excessive amount of time or the top could start to bubble. We were lucky that when we noticed it and got it wet again, the bubbles went away.
customer_reviews.author: Chris NY

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money!!
customer_reviews.text: After one use, the sides started ripping off. Piece of junk. I left a message with company and got no response. Customer service sucks. Bought a Morey Boogie board for half the price from Costco. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 5 yo daughter's birthday. She loves it. We took it to the beach with a few friends and it was a hit. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: So far, this is exactly what we were looking ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is exactly what we were looking for. We have not taken it to the ocean yet, but our granddaughter has been playing with it in the pool and absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: These boards peel apart within days after light use with kids in a pool...two boards...same "peeling apart" problem on both!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these boards and the colored part of both boards started to peel away from the other part of the board after just three weekends of light use in my in ground pool with 11 yr old kids. This product is garbage. Do not waste your money. The product failed, peeled apart, in the exact same way on both boards, so there is obviously a serious design/manufacturing problem with these boards.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Greisiger

customer_reviews.title: Great body board
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a mean to try to get my 6yo daughter into water sports instead I ended up using it during our vacations as it was to rough for her. I don't trust lanyard leashes as they seem dangerous for kids; this body board has the coiled leash which is way better. I'd say it's almost impossible to get a better value!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ríos

customer_reviews.title: We also bought a lucky bums one at that same time for our older son and that one has held up great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at the beginning of the summer and it hasn't lasted the whole summer. The glue hasn't held up. We also bought a lucky bums one at that same time for our older son and that one has held up great
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria W.

customer_reviews.title: Holes and dents after 3hr use in Hawaii.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly it came dented on the bottom secondly it got destroyed in a few hours on the beach. We will be returning it asap.
customer_reviews.author: R.Scott

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, fell apart after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Product came apart at the seams after one full day use on the beach... would not recommend! Cheaply made foam covering a piece of styrofoam. We bought 4, one for each of our kids and 3 fell apart after one day on the beach. Company should be ashamed and out of business because no one would ever buy another product from them after purchasing these...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Blister on surface of the board the second day of use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these boards for my sons and a two other different boards for my daughter and myself. My youngest son’s board worked great. My oldest sons board developed a bubble on the surface the second day he used it. Other than that, they love the boards
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Surf's up, but the price is just right.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, a green one and a blue one, for a last minute beach trip. They arrived on time and undamaged; no warping or bending in the the foam. My kids spent 8 hours in the ocean putting these boards to use. Perfect size. Perfect price. Surf's up!
customer_reviews.author: Tarf_Gnams

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great . My 14 and 12 year old son love it. You do have to be a certain and wait
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it! Large bubbles appeared after 1.5 of off and on use.
customer_reviews.text: One time use and bubbles appeared after being in and out of water for 1.5 hours of off an on use. One very disappointed 5 year girl and mom. Would’ve been better off buying a board for a fraction of the price at Target based on the quality of this item. Here I thought purchasing what appeared to be a high quality item would be worth it. Nope.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable- Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: Our teenage kids loved the board. It was perfect for our family vacation and will last for a few more.
customer_reviews.author: lifesajourney29

customer_reviews.title: Great board, great service!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his board. He received his board for Christmas however shortly after he began to use this summer, a defect in the board prevented him from using it. Surf and Snow Warehouse stepped up to the plate and made sure he had a new board to use ASAP. Cannot recommend this place enough for great service and honoring their satisfaction warranty. Would purchased from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Mims

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have taken this board to the beach only 2 times and it already has cracks on the bottom edge. Pieces are cracking off and now there are giant air bubbles in the top of the board. It looked nice upon arrival but our cheap boards from Walmart for $20 have lasted a couple summers. Would never buy this product again. Super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: NICE!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for my children. Everything came as expected, correctly boxed nicely, I received e-mails from the company and they are very good quality. I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha

customer_reviews.title: Bottom Section Peels Off
customer_reviews.text: It sounds like it is not an issue for all, but the one I bought for my child (after 8-10 outings) the bottom started to peel off and bubble up, making it unusable. Tried to glue it back on but the problems remained unfortunately. I was hoping spending a bit more would = a superior product, but that is not the case with this particular model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great board. It arrived on Friday
customer_reviews.text: Great board. It arrived on Friday, hit the beach on Saturday. Daughter said it was slick on the bottom and rode the waves beautifully. The strap was great and she had a blast. Wished it was blue, (out of stock) but definitely worth the money. Have gone through several foam ones that have all snapped...hoping this one goes the distance. I'm sure she will put but to good use
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Just like the OWN THE WAVE Beach Attack WAVE WEAPON
customer_reviews.text: It was tough deciding between this one and the OWN THE WAVE Beach Attack WAVE WEAPON. I found out they are made by the same company, so it depends on color and design preference. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Magical Dragon

customer_reviews.title: 😍❤️😘
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but excellent. I buy this for my son and he love this
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Great Board for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking board. worked great and the kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: One use at the beach and it totally fell apart.
customer_reviews.text: The first time my 6 year old daughter used this boogie board at the beach she came out of the water with the top foam (colored part of the board) completely feeled off. She's 6, so there were no major waves and she wasn't in the water for long. Completely disappointed considering the fact that i missed the "retun period" by 3 weeks. Complete waist of $60.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gogan

customer_reviews.title: Too bad...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had headed the caution of some of the reviews. Fell apart on our 5th trip out. Bubbling started on the third.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Board separating after 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this board. I purchased this board for my 13 year old granddaughter this past January. We just got back from the beach and this is what it looks like after 3 days. We followed all the warnings about keeping it out of the sun when we were on the beach but it didn’t matter. I spent over fifty dollars figuring I was getting her a decent board. I would have been better off buying a twenty dollar throw away board.
customer_reviews.author: RONALD GREENE

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: After our second season with this board only using it a handful of times the bottom of the board came detached and cracked. Would not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Item began to bubble after one week's use in California. Used by 10 year old boy weighing 95 pounds. Did not expect the world, but expected more than a week's use. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for my daughter’s birthday and it arrived with two big gashes on the front of the board. I ordered a replacement immediately and the second one came with even bigger gashes. Sending back and going with another company. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: jrivera77

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun Investment
customer_reviews.text: My daughter moved to Pacific Beach recently and through friends she was able to get some body boarding time in using borrowed equipment. I had the remedy and sent her the Beach Attack Pack along with a set of fins as well. I am a hero with this set up. Her friends were jealous. Great package and great price. Recommending to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mims

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Bought this board at the beginning of the summer and it has already come apart. This is a terrible board. We have owned numerous boards over the years and I haven’t had one come apart this quickly. Buyer beware, espadrille the raise their prices during the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: valeric

customer_reviews.title: ... sun - But the bubble went back down once cool and had no further difficulties
customer_reviews.text: Held up OK for a week on the Ocean - Foam top did bubble up after a short time exposed to direct sun - But the bubble went back down once cool and had no further difficulties... Overall OK product...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Louth

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My son used this for a week straight on vacation. It stood up well to the frequent use. Last year we paid $70 at a local shop to a board that appeared similar - however that board’s backing started coming apart almost immediately. We’re happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Wave Board
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this wave board for my 13 year old daughter for our summer home. She has used it 4 times, and seems to love it. Very good quality. Thank you for the wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Hockey Mom

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed. Not even worth the money I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned immediately. Had some dings on it and you could see the glue on the back. Front of board was made of cheap material that would scratch right off, very disappointed. Not even worth the money I had to pay to return it, save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Sklxo

customer_reviews.title: Great boards
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these this summer. One for me and two for my grandgirls. These are a quality product! The leashes are far superior to the others we had and the design/construction makes this board easy to handle in the surf. I highly recommend these boards.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Used two times and the skin on the back and top are already peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: Cash32

customer_reviews.title: This is a company built on integrity.
customer_reviews.text: This would be the only place i ever buy a body board from. These guys are genuinely concerned about your experience with them. I bought a body board for my grandson and he loves it. Its a good looking quality built board.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie A.

customer_reviews.title: Best boogie board ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my birthday and I’m 5”6’, 130lbs it worked fantastically in rough surf for our 4 vacay. Follow the instructions that come with the board and you’ll love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Mstotler

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my young grandson....could have chosen other similar brands which would have been just fine but I chose Own the Wave for their customer service....excellent! I will be giving it as a birthday gift and feel so confident that if anything is wrong with it (which I doubt-it looks great) that I can contact them and they will take care of it. They have reached out to me after delivery and I really appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice board!
customer_reviews.text: This bodyboard is a lime green with purple dots. Great color to see the kids on the water! Arrived on time and no damage! Love the leash and that you can also attach a separate leash to your ankle to keep your swim fins with you. Very lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Christian music

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last one summer season
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t even last one summer! And it wasn’t even used many days in the ocean. Bought three of them and two have the outer cover peeling off so they are now becoming pieces of styrofoam. It says one year warranty but I can’t seem to find out how to get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie Caruso

customer_reviews.title: great for boogie boarding
customer_reviews.text: These boards are great for boogie boarding in big waves on one of the Great Lakes! They seem solid and well constructed, and the small business that sells the boards is extremely customer oriented.
customer_reviews.author: Pam R.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.text: These lasted one and a half summers. Purchased for Christmas 2018, earlier this summer the white bottom separated from the upper layer on all three boards purchased for 4, 7, and 9 year old girls. They were used less than fifteen days in total.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 321

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, separated seams after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: 2 days at beach and separated... Not quality sent first back as was dented out of box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for our children. Lasted a few days short of a year with very limited actual use. Amazon service was horrible handling this situation. Hopefully, the manufacturer will properly resolve the issue. I Will update this review shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Bower

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a Christmas gift for my kids. Started using them in Jume. It is now July and the entire surface has delaminated. Expensive Junk!!! Do not buy. Stick with the name brands, Body Glove, Morey etc.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift this past year ... my daughter finally got to use it now in the summer, after a few uses it fell apart. Absolute trash after a handful of uses. did not even last half a summer. it is coming a part at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The board arrived in good condition and held up well at the beach for myself and the grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy44

customer_reviews.title: Board arrived on time and received email with caring instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: Board arrived on time and received email with caring instructions from the seller(Surf and Snow Warehouse). Board arrived as expected and exceeded all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: jhuffman

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍 company!
customer_reviews.text: I had a small problem and these folks went above and beyond to quickly take care of it! Thanks so much! I am looking forward to a fun summer at the beach!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Harris

customer_reviews.title: Bubble board
customer_reviews.text: It was great until we left it in the sun and the foam on the top of the board delaminated. It will not stick back down and has a big bubble in it now.
customer_reviews.author: _Me

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved the boards although the green and yellow board had some slight indentations from packing/shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew John Hall

customer_reviews.title: Quality Board
customer_reviews.text: Used the board today like a pro! Perfect rides. Sturdy leash. Good packaging. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: dawn m gamberale

customer_reviews.title: Has to replace it after using it maybe 10 times over a year
customer_reviews.text: Used it maybe 10 times top and the glue that holds the blue coating broke. Now I have to throw it away and buy a new one.!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed and so was my son
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my son's birthday present. He took it to the beach and the first day the sides tore off. I was very disappointed and so was my son. The company refunded my money immediately. Thank you customer service
customer_reviews.author: Heather Stone

customer_reviews.title: Initial View - Good product
customer_reviews.text: My kids haven't played with them yet since they are a gift but they look like good quality so far. They shipped quickly and arrived undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jones

customer_reviews.title: skin delaminated on 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: Looked ok but the skin separated from the board all the way across the front of the board back about 6" on the second use.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Liberty Mathew

customer_reviews.title: these are great. We've only used them twice so far
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, these are great. We've only used them twice so far. The wrist straps are very sturdy and did a great job. We got the blue and green. Will let you know if it doesn't hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Being a California kid that grew up on the beaches of Northern California, nothing gave me more pleasure than seeing the smiles of my wife and son as the rode they small waves to shore on this " boogie board " , thats what this Cali kid calls them. This is the right board for the job. Exceptional quality. Nothing better.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Surf & Snow Bodyboard package(s)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Underwent rigorous testing on Saturday at Oak Harbor by my wife and two young grandchildren. They enjoyed the boards tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR ALL KINDS OF WATER......OCEAN AND PONDS AND LAKES
customer_reviews.text: We were delighted to see how well our Beach Attack board works in the ocean waves. We live on beautiful Cape Cod, MA and have enjoyed it several times since we received it. The only criticism I have, and this has nothing to do with the excellence of the product is to see the words 'WAVE WEAPON". I do not like the overuse of war language in marketing.
customer_reviews.author: priscilla smith

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved using her new boogie board! Looking forward to another beach day.
customer_reviews.author: dwall

customer_reviews.title: Riding in the Waves
customer_reviews.text: Board arrived on time and in perfect condition. You can choose the type of cord that you wish to use and attach it yourself. The board is perfect for riding in the waves!
customer_reviews.author: Jen S.

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 2 beach days
customer_reviews.text: The board split after 2 uses in mild waves being used by my 7 year old daughter. It was purchased on July 3 for her birthday. Today is August 8 and this is the second beach day.☹️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Top layer (blue) tearing and tearing tearing! U derided (white) came with subtle scratches.
customer_reviews.author: <3 my brix

customer_reviews.title: Great board - sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great board! Bought for my 6yo daughter and she used all week riding the waves in Florida. Much better quality than the ones we previously have purchased at store that typically break in half by midweek. Sturdy, fast and really like the quality of the bungie wrist cord.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Moser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Board. My son loved it!! Also was sturdy for the plane trip to Daytona Beach!!
customer_reviews.author: Grady2708

customer_reviews.title: fell apart.  Got a refund
customer_reviews.text: the plastic/vinyl coating separated from the foam after only a few hours of use worthless my kids were upset. After this initial review. The company contacted me and gave us a full refund, by our choice Thank you
customer_reviews.author: jim mc

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Wave Rider.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Its a really light and comfortable board. Has made it thru several crashes, but mostly it gives a good wave ride. When you catch a wave right it is like gliding on air. So far i have noticed no damage , and it has been ridden into the sand and shells until it stops with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Had it for three weeks and it split in half while my daughter was out in the ocean with it. She’s 16. Average weight. This is a piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: MAR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Used it in the Atlantic and Pacific Ocean. Loved it. Excellent quality. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mahmud Khan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The children used it every day this summer and still looks brand new
customer_reviews.author: NYC Shopper

product_meta.title: Own the Wave 'Beach Attack Pack' - Wave Weapon Super Lightweight Body-Board - Comes with Premium Wrist Leash and Swim Fin Tethers
feature_bullets: The ‘Beach Attack Pack’ comes with a Super lightweight Own the Wave ‘WAVE WEAPON’ BodyBoard, Own the Wave’s PREMIUM coiled bodyboard leash ($16.99 on its own), and a set of fin tethers to make sure you don't lose your swim fins in the waves. The PREMIUM coiled leash will keep your board attached to you at all times. PLEASE NOTE: Pack includes 1 bodyboard, 1 leash and 2 fin savers. Leash and Fin savers are at the very bottom of the board wrapped in a tight bundle underneath the plastic wrapping.

HDPE Slick bottom to intensify the performance driven by the board. It does not only add strength, but it also makes the bodyboard a resistance-free riding for improved speed and maneuverability. Its EPS core, bottom rear channels is for great execution and a crescent tail to enhance it more. Choose your best-loved colour and use the size chart (on the pictures) to know what will suit you.

You will be receiving your purchase together with printed instructions written by us (with photos of course!) on how to install your leash and use your fin tethers. We'll also tell you how to look after your WAVE WEAPON Body Board by leaving the board 'white side up' when in the sun. (This is the same for ALL 'soft' surfboards, Body-boards and SUP's as this stops air pressure building up within the board).

Buy with complete confidence, as all our products are stored and shipped quickly and reliably to you. All Own the Wave products are 100% guaranteed -- if it doesn't deliver what it is supposed to at any time within 12 MONTHS of purchase, it will be replaced or you'll be refunded -- your choice!

Thank you for looking at a product from our store, Surf and Snow Warehouse. We are a small family business that ONLY sells what we know and love -- water sports gear. We know our products, use our products, and stand behind them 100%. We are known for the great product support, advice and after-sales service we provide -- so if you have ANY questions about any of our products, please just ask.
